title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and mix in grated cheeses and plenty of black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving some cooking water, and immediately add to the pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture, creating a creamy sauce.
Add pasta water as needed to loosen the sauce.
Serve immediately with extra grated cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and 1 tbsp tikka paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill or fry chicken until lightly charred and cooked through.
In a separate pan, fry onion and garlic until soft.
Add remaining tikka paste and cook for 1 minute.
Add tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and cooked chicken, simmer for 5 more minutes.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with rice or naan.
